page.title: 05Attitudes in N.Duffield
page.content: We surveyed 19 different people about North Duffield.Everybody said that they enjoy living here.The majority of people said that there are not enough buses or shops.12 people thought that North Duffield could not be improved. Only 2 people have lived here all their lives.Some people moved here for their jobs,others liked the house or to be with their families.Most people came from Rothwell and Wakefield to work in the new Selby coal field. Others came from places like Wales or Lancashire. Nearly everyone said the biggest change was new houses and new people.We asked whether people thought that there should be more for teenagers in the village to do.We also asked whether North Duffield should be changed in the future.Everyone had a different opinion about that.
